tweet: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain. Bob Marley (1945 - 1981

If I were to begin life again, I would devote it to music.  It is the only cheap and unpunished rapture upon earth.  Sydney Smith
Susan J. Bissonette An optimist is the human personification of spring
William Saroyan: Good people are good because they've come to wisdom through failure. We get very little wisdom from success, you know.
